Key Match Events: David Brooks scored a goal in the third minute to give Wales an early lead
Neco Williams made it 2-0 for Wales in the 38th minute with a blast into the top corner
Teemu Pukki pulled one back for Finland on the stroke of halftime
Brennan Johnson restored the two-goal cushion for Wales in the 47th minute
Dan James made it 4-1 for Wales in the 87th minute with a solo goal
Post-Match Reflections: Neco Williams said it was a great performance and they came into the night with a game plan that came off
Williams also mentioned it was a special feeling to score for his country
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales will play Poland in the Euro 2024 play-off final on Tuesday
The winner of the match will book their place at the Euros
Others: Wales qualified for both of the past two European Championships
Wales also qualified for the 2022 World Cup in Qatar but failed to win a game and were knocked out in the group stage
